Name: Lotus Seed Soup
AttributesDescription: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 33%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription: Maintaining a healthy body is crucial. The combination of gold and silver lotus seeds in this recipe provides warmth, nourishment, and a calming effect on both the body and mind. It was the first medicinal meal Jianxin learned during her mountain retreat and remains one of her go-to recipes for overall health and well-being.
ObtainedShowDescription: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 33%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
